name: Zometry (Logic Night Games)
description:
---< About >---

Zometry is a really fun top down shooter.

Dive into the dangerous world of Zometry fighting zombies and trying to survive! Collect money to upgrade your weapons or buy ammunition.

Zometry was created for the LÖVE Jam 2023.

---< Status >---

Released!
